Package com.yantra.ypm.japi.ue

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    YPMCalculateShippingChargeUE
    User exit for getting the shipping charge of an order.
    YPMGetApplicablePricingRuleListUE
    User exit to externally determine applicable pricing rules for a given input item.
    YPMGetItemPriceUE
    User exit to externally determine the prices of line items.
    YPMGetLowestItemPriceUE
    User exit to externally determine the lowest prices of line items.
    YPMGetOrderPriceUE
    User exit to externally determine the price of an order.
    YPMGetPricingRuleDetailsUE
    User exit to externally determine contents of a Pricing Rule.
    YPMLoadCustomPricingRulesUE  
    YPMOverrideGetApplicablePricingRuleListUE
    User exit to override the output of getApplicablePricingRuleList API.
    YPMOverrideGetItemPriceUE
    User exit to override the output of getItemPrice API.
    YPMOverrideGetLowestItemPriceUE
    User exit to override the output of getLowestItemPrice API.
    YPMOverrideGetOrderPriceUE
    User exit to override the output of getOrderPrice API.
    YPMPricelistHeaderSelectionUE
    User exit for selecting the price list headers for the customer and customer attributes.
    YPMPricelistLineSelectionUE
    User exit for selecting price list lines for the default lowest unit price calculation.
    YPMRunCustomPricingRuleUE  
    YPMValidateCouponUE
    User exit for validating coupon.
